title: PA's Draft Preview featuring Tom Pelissero - QBs & LTs
description: Paul Allen is joined by Tom Pelissero of the NFL Network to break down the Vikings options in the upcoming NFL Draft. The pair break down what first and second round options might look like for both the QB and LT positions and then bust out in total dad mode at the end!
